rows.label: tlk46500174_04_msg0002
rows.name:
They've only gone and
stolen some of the Taminbi
roots I've been growing.

rows.label: tlk46500174_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Taminbi roots are so
nutritious and are prized
for their medicinal uses.

rows.label: tlk46500174_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Only a few were stolen, so it's
not that big a deal, but...

rows.label: tlk46500174_04_msg0005
rows.name:
I reckon it was just some kids playing
tricks. If so, they really need to be
taught what's right and what's wrong!

rows.label: tlk46500174_04_msg0006
rows.name:
That's why I'm looking for
help finding the suspects.
